description.value: An arcane mortuary contains equipment that aids spellcasters in creating undead. A spellcaster using this mortuary must still provide any special materials required for undead creation. Undead created in an arcane mortuary have 10% more Hit Points than a typical undead creature of the same CR. An arcane mortuary can also store up to five Medium or smaller corpses without them deteriorating due to time. One Large corpse can be stored in place of two Medium ones.
